website_summaries.verdict: This Gary the Snail plush toy looks just like the Spongebob character and is the perfect addition to any fan's collection.
pros: Genuine TY Beanie Baby with soft, smooth fabric and bright colors
cons: Price is a bit high for such a small plush toy

customer_reviews.title: It's Gary!  A Well-Made Gary!
customer_reviews.text: Gary is a colorful, quiet snail. His eye-stalks are stitched together, which keeps them from bending in a weird way, getting caught in other toys, and from getting damaged easily because together the stalks are more durable. Again, the colors are vibrant. The toy is not too big; it fits in a man's outstretched palm. Good quality. Packaged well in a tight plastic bag, so it did not arrive with lint or fuzzies or cardboard scraps or other nasty things stuffed animals in transit pick up. Stands up on his own like good little snail, so he is easy to pop onto a shelf. Meoww.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Fun Character
customer_reviews.text: Had just finished playing the pre-Broadway run of The SpongeBob Musical - I've always loved the "Gary" character, and one of my colleagues on the show had a "Patrick" Beanie on her stand for the entire run, so I decided to find "Gary" as a reminder of a really fun show.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis-Beck

customer_reviews.title: gary the snail
customer_reviews.text: We all know Gary the snail SpongeBob's pet that meows like a cat. Well I bought it and Gary came in good shape. The heart shaped tag that is on all Ty beanies. But the only thing I didn't like about it that Gary has is eyes out and you can't keep them straight together. But it is still very cool. But I gust the eyes out can be a little creepy.
customer_reviews.author: bruce stone

customer_reviews.title: This item is just the right size for a 4-5 year old to hold and cuddle.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a huge fan of SpongeBob. Gary is a favorite. He had a hard plastic Gary but it broke. This one is just right for him. He carries it everywhere. It is large enough to hold and easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this years ago and it still looks the same as the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzington

customer_reviews.title: Gary the Snail
customer_reviews.text: Prompt and fast shipping, I ordered Gary on a Monday afternoon and received him Wednesday afternoon the same week. Gary is very durable and accurate in comparison to his animated counterpart. He is soft, nicely sewn together, and has very bright colors. The bottom of Gary is a bit large making it difficult for him to sit without having to lean on anything. Still for five dollars with prime shipping, best money I ever spent on a SpongeBob item.Gary now hangs with Phineas, Ferb and Perry on my desk. SpongeBob soon to come (hopefully).
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This Gary plush is very well made and my daughter loves it!! Will not fall apart, I've had to wash it twice!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It was super small, the eyes came with cotton spilling out, and the price is not worth it at all. Although my daughter loves it, I have to improvise and try to stitch the eyes back together even though this listing claimed to be “new” and not used.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great for any Spongebob fan
customer_reviews.text: I'll be the first to admit that I am an adult Spongebob fan... call me a dork if you must! One of my favorite characters is Gary the snail, so I thought that this is a must-have for a decoration in my room. I love it - it is soft and durable. I would definitely recommend this to any Spongebob fan!
customer_reviews.author: hoosier_girl

customer_reviews.title: Gary
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with anything SpongeBob and it is hard to find Gary. There is no educational value to this toy (for any that have seen SpongeBob you understand) but my daughter loves it all the same. Made well and just the right size for a 4 year old. Seller was great and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Meee-ow!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It is a stuffed Gary. It is high quality, as cute as a stuffed sea snail can be. My 5yo daughter adores it and I am pretty fond of it too. Makes me want to buy the rest of the spongebob characters.
customer_reviews.author: AngelineM

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons 2nd birthday and he absolutely loved it. It's a great buy. It's very durable and looks just like gary. Yes its small but it's better than dragging around much larger stuffed animals. He fell asleep with in his arms the second day we had it. Definitely recommend this toy!
customer_reviews.author: jpizano

customer_reviews.title: Ty Beanie Baby Gary the Snail, SpongeBob SquarePants
customer_reviews.text: Gary is so cute. I am not a big SpongeBob fan but my granddaughter Kali is. She wanted a different gift but her parents were getting that for her. It was not a difficult choice choosing this item. I was surprised at the quality of Gary. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Fannie Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly has expected and it was nice to be able to order a whole set of spongebob characters. If you know a fan, this is a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: sjc

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness ****
customer_reviews.text: recommend this for kids of any age not a choking hazard so that is a mega plus and very cute and hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Meow.
customer_reviews.text: Gary is a cutie, no doubt about it. He's just small and large enough for my preschooler's hands. The texture is smooth and clean, no frays or random strings. Clean and perfect for any Gary lover.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley L Chamblee

customer_reviews.title: Gary beanie
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Gary beanie! I bought the spongebob beanie the same time I bought Gary and when I opened the box, I couldnt believe how big Gary was! He looked huge compared to spongebob (they are about the same size though), but for some reason Gary looks bigger. Excellent beanie baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Too cute:)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is a huge fan of SpongeBob. This is the cutest toy! It is a good size, well made and just plain adorable. My daughter absolutely loves it. Great gift for any fan of SpongeBob & Gary.
customer_reviews.author: KYKellyK

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this and she loves it. It's on the small side, but she still really enjoys it. It looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Gary!
customer_reviews.text: Gary is the cutest on this show. I like how the TY beanie baby isn't too big or little, it's just the right size. I couldn't find these anywhere else at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cates

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a small size Gary but it is cute and easy to take everywhere. If you are looking for a pillow size Gary, then don't buy this one because it is small.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Fine little Beanie Baby snail
customer_reviews.text: I love the imaginative colors on this crazy little snail. Surreal! I'm glad to have him around. I didn't even know it was a Spongebob character; my six-year-old granddaughter had to tell me. :-)
customer_reviews.author: MaraMiami

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: My girls got this for Christmas. They liked it and thought it was cute. It does look like Gary. It's not very big which I like because they have way too many toys.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can throw it in the washing machine ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! I love that I can throw it in the washing machine once in a while. Comes out perfect again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Greenway-Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this one most of all of his Spongebob beanie babies. We like to hold him up and meow. Not really to scale when you compare to the others, but he is still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan Favorite
customer_reviews.text: If you are a fan of SpongeBob, you know very well who Gary is. The plush doll I ordered was requested by my son who loves the show. The beanie baby-type plush Gary is kind of small but so is the real Gary. The Gary doll is soft and cuddly. Defintiely pick it up if you love the show.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Keating

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off amazon because we had acquired the Patrick and then later sponge bob beanie. So we bought Gary to complete the set. It looks just like the picture and was everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Oneandfive

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old loves Sponge Bob and this stuffed Gary was a really inexpensive gift that she was/is super excited about. You get exactly what you see in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: JNewman

customer_reviews.title: Gary likes Gary the Snail
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy. It is not very big (it can fit in the palms of your two hand), but it is fun to play with or to just have around. It is durable and enjoyable. This would make a perfect holiday (or anyday) gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old girl loves it and she throws it around a lot but it stays in good shape.
customer_reviews.text: Gary, a high quality lovable and huggable plush. 7 year old girl loves it and she throws it around a lot but it stays in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: N. Luu

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a young boy for christmas and he loved it. I wish I would've gotten more of the set they were like 5 bucks at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos09x

customer_reviews.title: ... for my autistic sister 5 years ago and she loved it so much and took it everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my autistic sister 5 years ago and she loved it so much and took it everywhere. Sadly, she lost it at school recently and she has been devastated.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Treasured Toy
customer_reviews.text: Gary is my daughter's favorite Spongebob character. She is ENAMORED with the little Gary toy! He is well made, and feels so soft and cuddly. He looks just like Gary! Couldn't ask for more from Ty!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Got this item for a Gary the Snail fan of Sponge Bob. They loved it and collectible! Came beautifully packaged and even wrapped in heart tissue paper! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: jbus4323

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: This Gary was exactly what it said. It's good quality and looks just like the picture. It's a little smaller than I imagined but it worked out fine because I had to take it somewhere to give it to my friend for her birthday and it wasn't a burden to carry. It didn't take too long to arrive either. Now hopefully Amazon will stop emailing me about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Garcia

customer_reviews.title: FRIEND GIFT!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for 1 of my son's girlfriends & she was head over heals for it. She loves snails & this was the perfect size, perfect item to give her.
customer_reviews.author: KANROCKJUST

customer_reviews.title: A great present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old nephew since he loves Spongebob, and he LOVES it and carries it around a lot. In addition, it's a really cute toy and the size/look is good in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Ty Beanie Gary the snail
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I purchased the whole set of Sponge Bob Ty beanies from Amazon separately. My toddler daughter loves sponge bob and gary especially. Great size! Perfect for carting around wherever you go.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I have the smaller one and I thought this one was going to be bigger than the key chain one I had. It was only slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Gary Lovers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes Gary, and this was a great plush addition to her spongebob collection. Very well made as TY's are.
customer_reviews.author: JamieLF82

customer_reviews.title: L.A. Sharp
customer_reviews.text: This is a present for a friend of mine. His name is Gary. He's an adult it will be a cute and not considered a gag gift.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Gary
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grand daughter. She absolutely loves it and it became an instant member of her Spongebob toy collection!
customer_reviews.author: Jon A. Kruse Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Spongebob fans will love
customer_reviews.text: got this as a Xmas Gift for my BF son. He loves spongebob and was excited to get Gary. Cute and good size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and the Plankton Beanie Baby for a friend's daughter. She instantly loved them and said she had the best birthday ever.
customer_reviews.author: rion18

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: my kids love spongebob so they were really happy to see Gary, they just love this little character, it's fun
customer_reviews.author: tracy thomas

customer_reviews.title: Luvin Ummmmmm!
customer_reviews.text: A+ All I can say is they are easy on the billfold and our one year old granddaughter absolutely loves all her Ty Beanie Babies to death!
customer_reviews.author: 5th_Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Gary....
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. My daughter loved it. Great for collectors. Love that they are to beanies! Now I wish I could find Sandy!

customer_reviews.title: gary
customer_reviews.text: a soft Gary Toy full of charector :) made my youngest smile..and she is always quick to remind me..its GARY MOM

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality - smallish but very nice plush toy. I would recommend buying this one if you are a SB fan

customer_reviews.title: I Love Gary the Snail!
customer_reviews.text: This Gary is a great likeness to the cartoon character, is a quality plush toy, and is the perfect size for my desk!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jean Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Love this snail
customer_reviews.text: Bought with SpongeBob , Patrick and Mr. Krabs . Love this snail !
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Gary is well made and a very nice size.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Spongebob (and all the rest of his crew). I bought Gary because Spongebob needs Gary! I was impressed with the detail of Gary and his size is nice too. If you have a beanie baby collection (which I do not but we all love Spongebob) he would make an excellent addition!
customer_reviews.author: O_U_Contrary2

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be part of a group for a baby shower: Little boys are made of frogs, snails, and puppy dog tails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: toys
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this Gary, it seems he's harder to find than Spongebob. It is so cute and the perfect size for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: N. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Gary the Snail
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause it reminded me of my bf who is also named gary but i wasn't sure which one to buy but i ended up buying this one cause it was the brand name Ty which i've loved since i was a little kid. The product was delivered on time and it's exactly the same in the picture as in real life. It's one good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES having a Gary doll! He's soft, cuddly, and just the right size. She has slept with him every night since he arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann Howe

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is pleased with this toy. She sleeps with it. She's a big Spongebob fan.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carnley

customer_reviews.title: Gary the snail rocks
customer_reviews.text: So cute this stuffed plush is. My daughter loves him! Great job on the details on designing this plush. =)
customer_reviews.author: Barebonescouponing

customer_reviews.title: TY BEANIE BABY GARY THE SNAIL ---
customer_reviews.text: It seems not so often one finds Snail products which are close to being anatomically correct and also cute, but this Snail is serving both descriptions relatively well, so, yes, we love this Snail, and, yes, have already gifted this Snail to friends finding this Snail cute, and our purchases are through our favorite Amazon for good pricing, shipping, and service. Bless you all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Gary the Snail.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't send my grandson Sponge Bob without his pet snail. "Sponge Bob would be so sad" as he says.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Gary the Snail
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this imaginative snail from SpongeBob. It was exactly as described. She was so excited to see it and played with it all day! The shipping was pretty fast! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to collection
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 4, and loves Beanie Babies, and Spongebob. This was a fun addition to her collection, and she loves to play with this. I also bought the Spongebob Beanie, and she has already made her own Bikini Bottom. Very durable, as it gets played with daily.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Right on time.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened my amazon store card for Christmas. Ordered this Beanie Baby to complete my sons Spongebob collection. Not a big deal on this item, just a kids toy, but they were quick with shipping and had cute packaging paper. Appreciate them making my first time buying experiences off of Amazon good. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Stoops

customer_reviews.title: NO Problems
customer_reviews.text: Just like the spoungebob best day ever I was satisfied with this product , just like the child I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI L. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what my kid wanted for Christmas. So hard to find this stuff in store, but I'm glad I found it here! Soft cute and cuddly!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Countney

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this toy as a gift to my 6-year-old nephew who is very into Gary the Snail, and snails in general (but only ones with the eyes on stalks). I was excited to find this toy to give to him, and he was very happy to receive it!
customer_reviews.author: Wisefish

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: While I wasnt happy with the size of Gary, my kid loved it and thats what counts. If your kid is a SB fan and you want to collect for your children, then do so. Its worth it to see the joy when they have Gary. Meow
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Laboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He was perfect upon arrival.......my "grown friend" wanted him.....so she got her wish......what a wonderful Christmas surprise !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debby Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves says this is exactly how he wanted it to be and it is very good quality unlike the thin fabric bears that Ty offers
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Schein

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's review
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson... he loves GARY!!!!!!!! Wish it came in a larger size... but really durable... he carries it everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Terresa Shubert

customer_reviews.title: Oh Gary!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore Sponge Bob and always wanted a baby Gary! He is really cute and a perfect size. I am 56 and have Sponge Bob everything.
customer_reviews.author: Frances M. Eady

customer_reviews.text: I really am satisfied with this purchase. I bought it as a present and really liked it. Looks nice and I recomend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Gary The Snail
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for my 5 year old who loves SpongeBob...not too big, not too little. Perfect for snuggling with while he sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: There is SpongeBob stuff everywhere, but it can be hard to find a cute Gary. We were pleased with him when we (finally) found him!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Martin

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This beanie is just the right size and the quality excellent. By the way I live in Denmark, from ordering to recieving the package it took less than 48 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Great Gary Doll
customer_reviews.text: This toy is perfect!! My child is two years old and this doll is perfect for her! He fits right in with her Sponge Bob and Patrick! :)
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's GARY! Small, cuddly, cute, and SpongeBob's favorite pet. My daughter and I are having fun in all kinds of pretend play with it, and it's perfect for toddler hugging too.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute doll, the product arrived on time and was as described by the seller. It is a little smaller than the other Sponge Bob beanies we have.
customer_reviews.author: Studu

customer_reviews.title: My son love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my 3 year old who loves spongebob. This is a nice and small beanie he can carry around, but not to big that he can't play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: We put this Gary, the snail, toy in our daughter's Easter basket this year, and she just loves it! It's SO cute and cuddly and really looks like Gary from the "Spongebob" cartoon. Even the TY hangtag content is adorable! Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: ThistleFlower

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Gary~
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to complete my spongebob costume I made for Halloween. Very nice finishing touch! Now my kids play with it too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Laufenberg

customer_reviews.title: EXTREME DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to give my daughter for her 3rd birthday. I was very happy to read that it was a nice size, great value price. I assumed it WOULD be a good size because the item description says it weighs 3 pounds. To my extreme disappointment when I opened the box, this Gary weighs MAYBE 3 ounces! Although my daughter loves it, I was very upset. Almost heartbroken that it was so much smaller than described. I feel cheated!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne W

customer_reviews.title: Gary the snail
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my 5 year-old loves Spongebob. Gary is soooooooo small and he just sits there. I do not rec this toy. If it were $1 I would say buy it. But all your child will do is just throw this in the corner and let it collect dust.
customer_reviews.author: malesha

customer_reviews.title: toxic materila which kills fish in aquariums
customer_reviews.text: this produc which was put in a freshwater tank peeled and emitted toxic material that kills aquarium fish. made in china without any standards
customer_reviews.author: King's Gambit

product_meta.title: TY Beanie Baby Gary the Snail, SpongeBob SquarePants
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Faithful companion and pet extraordinaire, it?s Gary the Snail, SpongeBob?s favorite meowing mollusk. Gary also joins the gang
feature_bullets: Official product from Ty?s wildly popular Beanie Babies Collection
Look for the familiar heart-shaped tag that means you?ve purchased an authentic Ty product
Handmade with the finest quality standards in the industry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars211 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
